name: MEC Interval Carryall - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Carry everything you need, nothing that you don't. The Interval Carryall keeps your essentials organized as you commute to work or school, then grab dinner with friends on the way home. A microfleece-lined sleeve protects your tablet as you run around town. A top zipper keeps everything contained, while the external pocket makes it easy to grab your keys and transit pass.Made of durable 300-denier, high-tenacity polyester ripstop with a water-resistant finish.Back panel has light foam padding and air-mesh backing for breathability.Adjustable webbing shoulder strap.Top zipper gives you access to the main compartment.Inside you'll find a zippered pocket, pen holder and a microfleece-lined sleeve for a tablet.Zippered external pocket is great for quick-access items.
